**Reasoning:**

Since you have a guaranteed buyer (John) willing to pay your minimum acceptable price ($150), there's no incentive to offer the product to Bob for less. You start by offering the product at the highest price you can reasonably expect to get. While it's unlikely Bob will pay more than its value to him ($80), there's a chance he might value it more than that or be willing to negotiate.
